revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = SuperRange2 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.ubnt.com/sr2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = SR2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Type IIIA
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 2041 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = SWX-SR2 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:6D
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5213;AR5213A-001, D1E304B, 1103, TAIWAN; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2112;AR2112A-001, C1S001.00B, 1052, TAIWAN; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MMCX |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6153;AWL6153, 1110 8611AK, 027 PH;2; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/25/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B005VSXWEC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There could possibly be multiple major revisions of this device in the wild - the FCC ID EUT is an AR5212 card w/ 2 U.FL connectors while most others seem to be as depicted on the '''UBNT''' site. <small>.. or the FCC EUT is simply an early pre-release device and does not reflect on released models.</small>
===Additional specifications=== The following specs are per '''UBNT''''s datasheet for the device.
{{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-97 |2M=-96 |5.5M=-95 |11M=-92 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-94 |9M=-93 |12M=-91 |18M=-90 |24M=-86 |36M=-83 |48M=-77 |54M=-74 }} :<small>The Rx Sens specifications for all the XR/SR 2/5 series seem to be identical..</small>
==Links of Interest== [http://dl.ubnt.com/sr2_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
